resources.string: Something went wrong and will be fine in the next update
There is currently no WhatsApp status for download
onAdFailedToLoad : Failed to load Ad, Error code is: %d
Something happened internally; for instance, an invalid response was received from the ad server.
The ad request was invalid; for instance, the ad unit ID was incorrect.
The ad request was unsuccessful due to network connectivity.
The ad request was successful, but no ad was returned due to lack of ad inventory.
onAdOpened: Ad opening… user tap or click the ad
